Posts.Content: Mar 9, 2018 07:30AM Nikki2011 wrote: hello everyone I had a biopsy done 12 months ago on a lymph node on left breast and was to follow up six months the results said reactive. I just had a ultrasound done birads 4 on right breast a mass and thickened lymph nodes suspicious. I had a clip put in my breast after eight samples of the mass and three of the lymph node. I've been having night sweats, fevers, swollen lymph nodes and many more symptoms as more show up. I'm so scared that it is cancer. With weight loss and everything going on over 48 months my body's tired. I hope I get these results soon. I had a peripheral blood smear test done results are reactive. Has anyone had any of these things also ?
Posts.Title: I feel like my life is on hold until I get an answer Wookiecookie314 Rondeezee

Posts.Content: Mar 9, 2018 12:44PM Nikki2011 wrote: hello Wookiecookie I'm going through this to and I'll be praying for you and the others as well.I hope that you find out something very soon
